title: Spuds again
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner

abstract: "He was a good man really, but I don't think he liked training women too much... Very correct and very regimental."
description: Irrespresible and cheeky, Avis Quarrell was an avid church goer but liked nothing more than making fun of her superiors. One particular day landed her in hot water and back to peeling spuds.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002722; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Warnambool veterans]; Active; 2011
